title: Help picking font to compliment logo
content:
I've been trying to complete business cards but I can't decide on a font to use to compliment the logo. These are the picks I currently have.. any suggestions?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font-compliment.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150225214715/http:/typophile.com/files/font-compliment.png) | 27.57 KB |
author: MrKikkoman

comments.content:
in what context and what tone are you after?

on first glance Archer and Gill Sans are working IMO

----------  
**Paul Ducco**  
 [Graphic Designer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150225214715/http:/www.solid-creative.com/) - Melbourne

I'd also vote for Gill Sans because you've used a bit smaller size (or is it the x height). Ou could probably pair others just as well as long as you'd adjust sizes and weights.  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
_Robert Koritnik_

still loving the manilla text btw.

:)

----------  
**Paul Ducco**  
 [Graphic Designer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150225214715/http:/www.solid-creative.com/) - Melbourne
